statements: SELECT * FROM savings
SELECT goal_name, current_amount, target_amount FROM savings WHERE goal_id = 1
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE current_amount > target_amount
SELECT goal_name FROM savings ORDER BY date_created DESC
SELECT goal_id, current_amount FROM savings WHERE target_amount < 1000
SELECT goal_name, current_amount, target_amount FROM savings WHERE current_amount > target_amount ORDER BY goal_name ASC
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01' AND target_amount < 10000 ORDER BY current_amount DESC
SELECT goal_name, target_amount, date_created FROM savings WHERE current_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY date_created DESC
SELECT goal_name, target_amount, current_amount FROM savings WHERE last_updated > '2021-06-01' ORDER BY current_amount DESC, goal_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_goals, SUM(target_amount) AS total_target_amount FROM savings WHERE current_amount IS NULL
SELECT * FROM savings_goals WHERE completed = TRUE;
SELECT goal_name, target_amount FROM savings_goals WHERE progress_percentage >= 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT goal_name, current_amount, target_amount FROM savings_goals WHERE target_amount > current_amount;
SELECT id, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM savings_goals WHERE completed = true ORDER BY goal_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, goal_name, target_amount FROM savings_goals WHERE progress_percentage >= 50 ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT id, goal_name, target_amount, current_amount, progress_percentage FROM savings_goals WHERE target_amount > current_amount ORDER BY current_amount DESC;
SELECT t.id, t.savings_goal_id, t.transaction_date, t.amount, s.goal_name FROM transactions t JOIN savings_goals s ON t.savings_goal_id = s.id WHERE t.amount > 1000 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;

SELECT s.id, s.goal_name, SUM(t.amount) AS total_amount_spent FROM savings_goals s JOIN transactions t ON s.id = t.savings_goal_id GROUP BY s.id, s.goal_name HAVING SUM(t.amount) > s.current_amount * 0.5 ORDER BY total_amount_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM savings;
SELECT goal_name, target_amount, progress FROM savings ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE current_amount < target_amount;
SELECT goal_name, current_amount, target_amount FROM savings WHERE progress >= 50;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE target_amount > current_amount ORDER BY goal_name DESC;
SELECT goal_name, progress FROM savings WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT u.username, s.goal_name, su.updated_amount FROM users u JOIN savings s ON u.user_id = s.id JOIN savings_updates su ON s.id = su.savings_id;
SELECT goal_name, target_amount, current_amount, progress FROM savings WHERE goal_name LIKE 'Save%';
SELECT * FROM savings WHERE current_amount > 1000 AND progress < 0.5 ORDER BY goal_name ASC, created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username DESC
SELECT user_id, username FROM users LIMIT 3
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT * FROM savings ORDER BY user_id DESC, goal_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, goal_name, goal_amount FROM savings WHERE current_amount < goal_amount ORDER BY goal_progress DESC, goal_name DESC

SELECT s.user_id, s.goal_name, sh.action_type, sh.amount, sh.date FROM savings s JOIN savings_history sh ON s.user_id = sh.user_id AND s.goal_name = sh.goal_name WHERE sh.amount > 1000 ORDER BY sh.date ASC

SELECT s.user_id, u.username, sh.amount, sh.date FROM users u JOIN savings_history sh ON u.user_id = sh.user_id JOIN savings s ON s.user_id = u.user_id AND s.goal_name = sh.goal_name WHERE sh.action_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY u.username ASC, sh.date DESC
SELECT u.username, us.email_notifications, us.weekly_report FROM users u JOIN user_settings us ON u.user_id = us.user_id WHERE us.email_notifications = TRUE ORDER BY u.username ASC
SELECT * FROM Savings WHERE goal_amount > 5000
SELECT id, goal_name FROM Savings WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT goal_name, current_amount FROM Savings ORDER BY current_amount DESC
SELECT id, goal_name, end_date FROM Savings WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, goal_name, current_amount FROM Savings WHERE goal_name LIKE '%vacation%'
SELECT * FROM Savings ORDER BY goal_amount DESC, start_date ASC;
SELECT goal_name, current_amount FROM Savings WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT s.goal_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM Savings s JOIN Transactions t ON s.id = t.savings_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT u.username, u.email, s.goal_amount, sc.category_id FROM Users u JOIN Savings s ON u.id = s.id JOIN Savings_Categories sc ON s.id = sc.savings_id;
SELECT s.goal_name, SUM(t.transaction_amount) AS total_transactions FROM Savings s LEFT JOIN Transactions t ON s.id = t.savings_id GROUP BY s.goal_name HAVING total_transactions > 1000;
